experience.title: Digital Marketing Manager
experience.description: MediaMint is an advertising firm providing digital marketing and technology operations expertise to its clients. In this organization, I am working in the Ad Operations department having hands on experience in tools like Google Ad Manager, Google Analytics, Looker Studio, CRM softwares etc.

experience.title: Co-Owner
experience.description: FNF is a venture at Institute of Management Technology in Nagpur, which aims to serve quality food and beverages to the students of the college. It not only takes care of the cravings but also satiates the need for entertainment within the campus.

experience.title: Digital Marketing Intern
experience.description: The purpose of this startup is to power the transformation of the companies into a brand by providing Digital Consultancy. The task I performed: Working on live projects of enhancing the digital presence of the companies in various sectors by performing Digital Brand Audit, Competitor Research & Analysis  of digital assets and Persona Research  and designing content mapping strategies for the companies.

experience.title: Marketing & Operations Intern
experience.description: Unschool is ed-tech startup which has launched online courses in various fields like business, software & technology, design etc.My role at this organization was: Market research to identify the target market, sales and marketing of the products through various marketing channels and hiring of the interns and training them.

education.title: Institute of Management Technology, Nagpur
education.description: Activities and Societies: Member | Corporate Interaction Committee CIC is a student driven body that helps in bringing the corporate world closer to the student managers. IMT Nagpur is an AICTE approved business school and offers postgraduate diploma and executive education programmes in management. The mission of the college is focused on the overall development of the individuals who can serve their organizations, their society and humanity at large with dedication.
education.description_html: Activities and Societies: Member | Corporate Interaction Committee CIC is a student driven body that helps in bringing the corporate world closer to the student managers.

education.title: National Post Graduate College
education.description: National P.G College is an autonomous college, NAAC Grade 'A' and College with Potential for Excellence (CPE). The motto of the college is maritum ethicus i.e. merit with ethics. The academic programmes of the college have been designed to ensure dynamic and innovative methodologies of learning to enhance the academic accomplishments of the students.
